name: Plague Panic
description:
During the 17th century at the height of the Black Death.
A rare strain of the virus mutated and started to infect the masses turning them into...

ZOMBIES!!!

The only known survivor? Dr Medicus, the last living Plague Doctor. Will he be able to save the world from from total destruction? Or will he panic under the pressure of the plague...

In this game you have to survive for as long as possible inside of the map by killing as many zombies as you can with the guns and ammo at your disposal.

WASD to Move
Mouse to Aim
Left Click to Shoot
Right Click to Change Weapon

Features of this game include:

  • Two maps based on hot spots of the Black Death (London and Paris)
  • 4 different weapons (Revolver, Assault Rifle, Shotgun, and Chaingun)
  • Randomly spawning health and ammo packs
  • Decked out point and scoring system

Project Manager: Corey Zeneberg
Coding Specialist: Kyle Rosenau
Graphic Designer: Ethan Honoway
